channel.title: Is this real
channel.description:
Greetings,
It has come to our attention that you are trying to sell your personal World of Warcraft account(s). As you may not be aware of, this conflicts with the EULA and Terms of Agreement. If this proves to be true, your account can and will be disabled. It will be ongoing for further investigation by Blizzard Entertainment's employees. If you wish to not get your account suspended you should immediately verify your account ownership.
You can confirm that you are the original owner of the account to this secure website with: https://www.battle.net/account/support/login-support.xml
Login to your account, In accordance following template to verify your account.
* Account name * Account password * First and Surname * Secret Question and Answer Show * Please enter the correct information
If you ignore this mail your account can and will be closed permanently.
Once we verify your account, we will reply to your e-mail informing you that we have dropped the investigation.
Regards,
Account Administration Team Blizzard Entertainment

item.title: Is this real
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

They don’t care what level you are they want your account to spam with.

Read full topic

item.description:

Offtopic: Immortal Technique is the shit and dancing with the devil is my anthem.

item.title: Is this real
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

'tiz fake dude.

I’ve been playing world of warcraft for a number of years now, and I’ve had this junk mail come through also. That link you provided doesn’t even work for me so I see no reason why you need to stress about your account being banned.

Get on with it, ignore the mail and enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this real
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

No, it most likely isn’t. To make sure it isn’t go to battle.net and log in yourself, do not follow links send in emails EVER ( unless you know them personally and even then watch out ).

Read full topic

item.title: Is this real
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

Greetings,

It has come to our attention that you are trying to sell your personal World of Warcraft account(s). As you may not be aware of, this conflicts with the EULA and Terms of Agreement. If this proves to be true, your account can and will be disabled. It will be ongoing for further investigation by Blizzard Entertainment’s employees. If you wish to not get your account suspended you should immediately verify your account ownership.

You can confirm that you are the original owner of the account to this secure website with:
https://www.battle.net/account/support/login-support.xml

Login to your account, In accordance following template to verify your account.

  • Account name
  • Account password
  • First and Surname
  • Secret Question and Answer
    Show * Please enter the correct information

If you ignore this mail your account can and will be closed permanently.

Once we verify your account, we will reply to your e-mail informing you that we have dropped the investigation.

Regards,

Account Administration Team
Blizzard Entertainment

Read full topic
